| HistoryText             = The Light Brigade is a team consisting of the [[Universal Inhumans (Earth-616)|Universal Inhumans]]. As part of a ritual demonstration of battle prowess, they leapt into the Negative Zone to do battle with the Annihilation Wave.{{r|Fantastic Four #578}}

The team was captured by [[Arthrosians]] in the [[Negative Zone]], and [[Annihilus (Earth-616)|Annihilus]] forced ​​them to fight to the death in the arena against the Arthrosians' champions. When [[Jonathan Storm (Earth-616)|Human Torch]] was captured, he teamed up with the Light Brigade and they escaped. They attacked Annihilus and Johnny took away his [[Cosmic Control Rod]]. After that Johnny opened a portal to the [[Baxter Building]] and they all returned to [[Earth]].{{r|Fantastic Four #600|601}}

They were later all invited to a party at [[Peter Parker (Earth-616)|Peter Parker]]'s flat by Johnny Storm. As Johnny lost to Kal at poker, both roommates were forced to drink [[Kymel]], starting a night of craziness in the streets of New York for Kal, Els Udonta, Peter, Johnny, [[Mary Jane Watson (Earth-616)|Mary Jane Watson]] and  [[Mik (Moloid) (Earth-616)|Mik]], including Johnny flirting with MJ and a [[New York City Police Department (Earth-616)|mounted cop]], Kal declaiming to that cop's horse and Peter making out with Els.{{r|FF #17}}<!-- 

...{{r|Royals #6}}{{r|Royals #7}} -->
